Main properties
Bug: This plugin isn't saved never.
Fix it: Save the Flexform once.
Bug: There isn't any TypoScript configuration for this plugin.
Fix it: include the Static Template "Browser"!
The DRS - Development Reporting System - is enabled. This costs performance and is a security risk for any operative sytem. You can disable the DRS in the extension manager. Status: %status%.

If you get an unexpected result nevertheless, please refer to the extension manager. There is an evaluator too.you can enable the DRS - the Development Reporting System. You will get a report of the work flow. You enable the DRS in the extension manager.
If you have any question about Flip it!, please refer to the online manual Flip it!.
